ch0304_00_aoki/0101_0701_01_10:
Hello, Larry here. Glad you could make it,
[Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0304_00_aoki/0101_0701_02_10:
Not much time for chit-chat today. Let’s start
knocking tasks off our list as usual.
ch0304_00_aoki/7101_0701_01_10:
People, Pokémon... There’s no need to
overcomplicate things.
ch0304_00_aoki/7101_0701_02_10:
Nowadays people only seem to want a shock
factor. Something weird, something bizarre.
ch0304_00_aoki/7101_0701_03_10: When all’s said and done, simplicity is strongest.
ch0304_00_aoki/7102_0701_01_10:
Lunchtime is one of the few things that a salaried
employee like me can look forward to at work...
ch0304_00_aoki/7102_0701_02_10:
We can decide whether to spend that precious
time eating something familiar or trying out a new
restaurant.
ch0304_00_aoki/7102_0701_03_10:
It’s not just about the meal. The decision-making
process leading up to it is also something to look
forward to.
ch0304_00_aoki/7103_0701_01_10:
You don’t necessarily have to follow every
instruction from your boss.
ch0304_00_aoki/7103_0701_02_10:
But I pretend to follow them, at least, so I can
avoid hassles later on.
ch0304_00_aoki/7103_0701_03_10:
That’s a technique you can use to get by in the
workplace. Keep it in mind.
ch0304_00_aoki/7104_0701_01_10:
I’m here in this famous tourist spot, but I can’t
really spread my wings while my boss has her
eye on me.
ch0304_00_aoki/7104_0701_02_10:
I guess I’ll do what I usually do on my lunch break
and find a spot to Roost...
ch0304_00_aoki/7105_0701_01_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ], which do you tend to
favor: the exceptional or the average?
ch0304_00_aoki/7105_0701_02_10:
I was thinking of inviting you to have a meal
sometime.
ch0304_00_aoki/7105_0701_03_10:
Casually figuring out your client’s preferences is a
special skill that you learn as a salaried
employee.
ch0304_00_aoki/1701_0702_01_10: It’s not for work, so you don’t have to sign for it.
ch0304_00_aoki/2501_0701_01_10: Pasio seems to have many good restaurants.
ch0304_00_aoki/2501_0701_02_10:
Ah, I’m not asking for specific recommendations,
though...
ch0304_00_aoki/2501_0701_03_10:
I actually enjoy walking around and looking for a
place I might like.
ch0304_00_aoki/2501_0702_01_10: I seek the exceptional only when it comes to food.
ch0304_00_aoki/2501_0702_02_10:
Pasio has a variety of cuisines to choose from, so
it’s hard to stick to just one.
ch0304_00_aoki/2511_0701_01_10:
Ever since I met a certain individual, I now find
myself gazing up at the sky every once in a while.
ch0304_00_aoki/2511_0701_02_10:
There’s scenery you’ll never even notice if you
stick to flat, well-trodden paths.
ch0304_00_aoki/2511_0702_01_10: I don’t dislike the vast, clear sky...
ch0304_00_aoki/2511_0702_02_10: But I don’t think I can reach it.
ch0304_00_aoki/2511_0702_03_10:
It’s nice to know that there’s something like that
out there, though.
ch0304_00_aoki/3001_0701_01_10:
Good morning. I already can’t wait to take my
afternoon break...
ch0304_00_aoki/3003_0701_01_10:
Lunchtime is the highlight of my day. Now, where
should I eat...?
ch0304_00_aoki/3005_0701_01_10:
You shouldn’t work overtime. A competent Trainer
finishes on time so they can rest.
